analysis.description:
BCSCrowdsale.transferToBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#552-554) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol)

ERC20StandardToken.decimals (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getRealTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#150-154)

ERC20StandardToken.tokensIssued (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#91-92) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#107-108)

Reentrancy in BCSCrowdsale.invest (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#433-459):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(canInvest(msg.sender,msg.value)) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#434-436)
	- (tokensToBuy,excess) = howManyTokensForEther(weiPaid) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#437-439)
	- require(bool)(tokensToBuy <= tokensLeft() && tokensToBuy > 0) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#439-440)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiCollected (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#452-453)

Reentrancy in BCSCrowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#522-535):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getState() == State.FinishedFailure) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#523-525)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiCollected (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#529)

Reentrancy in BCSCrowdsale.transferToBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#552-554):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getState() == State.FinishedSuccess && ! withdrew) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- withdrew (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol)

Reentrancy in BCSCrowdsale.invest (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#433-459):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(canInvest(msg.sender,msg.value)) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#434-436)
	- (tokensToBuy,excess) = howManyTokensForEther(weiPaid) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#437-439)
	- require(bool)(tokensToBuy <= tokensLeft() && tokensToBuy > 0) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#439-440)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedFrom (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#446-448)
	- overpays (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#442-443)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#452)
	- tokensSoldTo (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#448-451)

Reentrancy in BCSCrowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#522-535):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getState() == State.FinishedFailure) (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#523-525)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedFrom (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#527-529)

ERC20StandardToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#90)
ERC20StandardToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#88)
ERC20StandardToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#89-90)
ERC20StandardToken.tokensIssued should be constant (/unique_chucks/23/0x2f97dc94317760c7204e72a5bd058c10b409dc12.sol#91-92)
